about_the_game:
The main plot of the game "Masonic Mysteries" unfolds in a world shrouded in mystery and secrets. You find yourself drawn into a shadowy game where the main question becomes: Who holds the key to unraveling the secrets of the Masons? As you strive to uncover the truth, you will encounter a tangled web of intrigue, betrayal, and danger.



The story begins with your encounter with the enigmatic organization known as the Masons, who control the world's wealth and resources. You discover that the Masons have deep roots and have long guarded secrets that can change the course of history. Your goal is to uncover these secrets and neutralize the influence of the Masons.



As you progress in the game, you discover that the Masons operate through secret symbols and hidden messages. You must decipher Masonic messages to penetrate the core of the organization, advancing towards the pinnacle of the cult. However, every wrong step can lead to mystical demise, with high stakes and irreversible consequences.



As you make progress in the game, you are given the opportunity to turn to the supreme mind with the questions that haunt you. A mind that has answers to all questions, created based on artificial intelligence. However, you need to be cautious as the FBI lurks in the shadows, ready to expose the truth and bring the Masons to justice. And as part of this organization, you may also be held accountable, regardless of your noble intentions. The question arises: can you trust your fellow conspirators, or is there a traitor among them?

In the game, you will have the opportunity to advance through the hierarchical ladder of the Masonic order.

You start your journey as a Masonic apprentice, delving into the organization's secrets and studying their rituals and customs. Gradually, you gain recognition and become a Brother of the order, joining the ranks of highly respected members of the Masonic community.
The next step in your development is the opportunity to become a Department Head, where you are entrusted with the management of important tasks and organization operations. Then, upon reaching certain skills and knowledge, you can become a Master of the Lodge, taking responsibility for conducting rituals and ceremonies of the Masonic order.
And finally, the highest step of your advancement is to become the Grand Master. Your authority and influence will reach their peak, and you will be entrusted with a leadership role in the Masonic organization.

Progressing through this hierarchical ladder opens up new opportunities, access to the secrets and knowledge of the Masons, and increases your status and prestige within the organization.

"Masonic Mysteries" offers you a unique gaming experience where each playthrough will be unique. Will you be able to uncover the secrets of the Masons and change the course of history, or will you immerse yourself in darkness and vanish into oblivion, or perhaps join them, becoming part of this cult? The answer lies within the game, awaiting those who are brave enough to find it.

name: Masonic Mysteries: Secrets Unveiled

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Unravel the secrets of the Masons and survive FBI's pursuit in Masonic Mysteries. High stakes and hidden dangers await.
